With connections to the largest health systems & payers, like:

The Problem: Delayed Care and Frustrated Patients

Client
XYZ Healthcare Provider
Industry
Healthcare (Hospital Network)

XYZ Healthcare struggled with fragmented systems that made accessing patient records slow and cumbersome. Healthcare providers were wasting hours searching for critical information, which caused dangerous delays in treatment.

 

Patients were left waiting too long for diagnoses, leading to anxiety and frustration. The lack of smoothÂ  communication between departments meant that important data often got lost, resulting in missed care opportunities and avoidable errors.

 

This inefficiency not only impacted patient outcomes but also strained the entire healthcare team, making their jobs harder and contributing to higher stress levels in an already demanding environment.

The Solution: Fasten Connectâ€™s Real-Time Data Sharing

XYZ Healthcare adopted Fasten Connect to tackle these inefficiencies and streamline their data-sharing processes

Fasten Connectâ€™s API quickly connected XYZ Healthcare to 30,000+ providers, giving instant access to patient records.
Instant Data Access
Fasten Connect automatically retrieves medical records, test results, and notes, eliminating manual processes.
Secure & Compliant
Fasten Connect makes sure all data sharing is HIPAA-compliant, keeping patient information safe.
